statements: SELECT * FROM signature_data
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT access_level, signature FROM signature_data WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE access_level = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM signature_data ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT id, signature, user_id, access_level FROM signature_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM signature_data WHERE access_level = 'admin' AND id > 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE user_id = 50 AND access_level = 'superadmin';
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE access_level IN ('admin', 'moderator') ORDER BY id ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM signature_data;
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT permission_type FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT permission_type, table_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT signature FROM signature_data WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE signature LIKE 'John%' AND id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' AND table_name = 'users' ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 10 AND table_name IN ('users', 'documents');
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT signature, user_id FROM signature_data WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, signature, user_id FROM signature_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'Admin' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM signature_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT id, user_id, signature FROM signature_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM signatures ORDER BY signature_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, signature_text FROM signatures WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT signature_id, signature_text FROM signatures WHERE signature_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT signature_id, signature_text FROM signatures WHERE signature_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT signature_text, timestamp FROM signatures WHERE user_id = '00112233-4455-6677-8899-aabbccddeeff';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '11223344-5566-7788-99aa-bbccddeeff00';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles;
SELECT * FROM signatures WHERE signature_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, signature_text FROM signatures WHERE user_id = 'c1515648-af4d-4c97-928c-0f220118091b';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin' OR role_name = 'Editor';

SELECT p.permission_type, r.role_name FROM role_permissions rp JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id JOIN roles r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY r.role_name ASC, p.permission_type DESC;
